::: {.column width=65%}
This is an implementation of the model described in

Flügge AJ, SC Olhede and D Murrell. 2012. The memory of spatial patterns – changes in local abundance and aggregation in a tropical forest. _Ecology_ **93**, 1540-49.

This model also requires [this NetLogo source file](distributions.nls) to run. You should place this file in the same folder as the model `.nlogo` file.
:::
